item.title: Getting started with uitableview
item.description: UITableView in detail # What is UITableView? UITableView is a most frequently used user interface object that presents data in a scrollable list of multiple rows in a single column that can also be divided into sections.It allows vertical scrolling only and is a subclass of UIScrollView. Why do we use UITableView? We can use UITableView to present a list of options that can be selected, to navigate through hierarchically structured data, present an indexed list of items, to display detail information and controls in visually distinct groupings making use of sections.
